column5: Pay for 6, Stay for 7 all summer long!! Book for a week at Casa Linda and only pay for 6 nights.   Fully appointed 2 bedroom, 2 bath beachfront condo in Port Aransas, TX. Hear the waves from the back patio! Our home is on a 7 acre property full of amenities-2 pools, shuffleboard, laundry room, tennis, more! Per night pricing includes all taxes.  City of Port Aransas Short-term Rental License Numb(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN)
column8: Steps to the Beach! Beat the heat at Casa Linda!!
